page.title: 12HOSPITALS
page.content: Paisley Maternity Hospital has a total of 132 beds.There are 4 wards, including a special care baby unit and 11 labour rooms.It employs 403 people, 12 doctors,288 nurses(including student midwives),9 porters and 94 domestic staff. All nursing staff are pre-trained.The average stay per. patient is 5.5 days.Patients from the islands are flown in by air ambulance. 2,516 babies were born here in the year ending March 1985. Of these 14 were still births. The Royal Alexandra Infirmary specialises in general surgery, orthopaedics,general medicine, an intensive care unit and accident and emergency services. There are 12 wards with 227 beds. There are 637 staff inc.62 doctors,279 nurses,27 porters and 269 domestic staff. Patients stay an ave. of 7.3 days.
